“And now I sign legislation which takes a sledgehammer to another wall,one which has, for too many generations,separated Americans with disabilities from the freedom they could glimpse,but not grasp.” 

George H.W. Bush at the signing of ADA  https://www.archives.gov/research/americans-with-disabilities/transcriptions/naid-6037492-remarks-by-the-president-during-ceremony-for-the-signing-of-the-americans-with-disabilities-act-of-1990.html
El Congreso mexicano ha enviado un mensaje claro al dictador venezolano Nicolás Maduro: no es bienvenido en #México.

President George H.W. Bush served our country honorably. He and Barbara will be remembered for their humble and devoted service to the country they loved. Jane and I send our deepest condolences to the entire Bush family.

RT @georgepbush My grandfather was the greatest man I ever knew.  His life spanned the American Century—he fought in World War II ... took part in the Texas oil boom ... served out a distinguished career in public service including serving as president during the final days of the Cold War. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DtTn1vCUcAAKrhD.jpg

RT @benwikler BREAKING—as in breaking democracy: a truly shocking & naked power grab underway in Wisconsin. Dems won every statewide race this Nov. Now, the GOP unveiled sweeping bills to straightjacket the Gov & AG, stomp on early voting, & lock in power on state Sup Court. Votes THIS TUE. 1/
RT @JebBush I already miss the greatest human being that I will ever know. Love you Dad!
President Bush was the last of the Greatest Generation to sit in the Oval Office, but his resolve will not be lost to the past; it will triumph onward.

RT @EARN Senator Cory Booker has introduced a bill aimed at closing the racial wealth gap. His plan would give low-income kids a significant nest egg (up to $50,000) to be used for college tuition or a down payment on a house.  https://www.vox.com/policy-and-politics/2018/10/22/17999558/cory-booker-baby-bonds

President George H.W. Bush was an American hero, a patriot and a wise and generous man. May he Rest In Peace.

RT @KateBennett_DC Barbara Bush used to sit on the steps of the South Portico at the White House, waiting for George Bush to return from trips. I thought of this picture tonight, and how happy she must be that he's coming home to her again. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DtTwmC0U8AAqe2X.jpg

Today boasting & insults are viewed as strong leadership while humility & dignity are viewed as weakness. The passing of our 41st President reminds us of what true leadership looks like.

President George H.W. Bush served our country honorably. He and Barbara will be remembered for their humble and devoted service to the country they loved. Jane and I send our deepest condolences to the entire Bush family.

George H.W. Bush was an American patriot who lived his life and served our country with dignity. From joining the Navy during WWII to the presidency, his devotion to public service was unmatched. Bruce and I send our heartfelt condolences to his family.

RT @SenBooker President George H.W. Bush leaves behind an extraordinary legacy of service and lifelong dedication to our country that he loved. I’m saddened to hear of his passing. My thoughts are with his loved ones. https://www.nytimes.com/2018/11/30/us/politics/george-hw-bush-dies.html
George H.W. Bush's commitment to public service and a better America will always remain with us. We send our deepest sympathy and prayers to the Bush family. #Bush41
RT @USNavy Fair winds and following seas, Sir. We have the watch. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DtVC6hfXgAA61V9.jpg

Hearts are heavy as we bid farewell to President George H.W. Bush. He was a faithful servant to his country whose legacy of leadership & love of homeland became a family tradition, earned him the admiration of  Americans & secured him a special place in the memory of every Texan.

President George H.W. Bush leaves behind an extraordinary legacy of service and lifelong dedication to our country that he loved. I’m saddened to hear of his passing. My thoughts are with his loved ones. https://www.nytimes.com/2018/11/30/us/politics/george-hw-bush-dies.html
RT @marcorubio President George H.W. Bush was an American hero, a patriot and a wise and generous man. May he Rest In Peace.

Today, George and his beloved Barbara are together, enjoying a well-deserved rest from their labors.

Today, his spirit joins a thousand points of light with his Creator, by whose brilliance may all our works be illuminated and inspired.

During Trump's campaign, he repeatedly promised the American people that “the rich would not gain at all” from his tax plan. He said it would provide a “big-league tax cut for the middle class."

He lied. 

It’s time for an economy that works for all of us, not just the rich.

Since my first day in Congress, combating HIV and AIDS has been a priority of mine. I won't stop fighting until this scourge is resigned to the history books. 

Let us honor the memories of those we’ve lost and rededicate ourselves to ending this pandemic. #WorldAIDSDay -NP http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1068915682019024896/pu/img/U7-tLO2MHXADNCb1.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1068915682019024896/pu/vid/240x180/z2BsI_Cy8LaPDwmn.mp4?tag=5

On December 1, 1955, Rosa Parks refused to give up her bus seat to a white passenger in Montgomery, Alabama. She was promptly arrested. Her bravery helped bring an end to unjust segregated bus laws. Her courage will never be forgotten. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DtYG3fYXQAAxQ6e.jpg

Since my first day in Congress, combating HIV and AIDS has been a priority of mine. I won't fighting until this scourge is resigned to the history books. 

Let us honor the memories of those we’ve lost and rededicate ourselves to ending this pandemic. #WorldAIDSDay -NP http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1068909367846567936/pu/img/UFuFBFdbKlJ6NHLy.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1068909367846567936/pu/vid/240x180/TTQlhFbHeW3Slt-D.mp4?tag=5
Today marks #WorldAIDSDay, a day to remember those we have lost, and recommit to American leadership in the fight to #EndAIDS through @PEPFAR and the @GlobalFund.

American hearts are heavy as we bid farewell to President George H.W. Bush. Today, George and his beloved Barbara are together, enjoying a well-deserved rest from their labors. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DtVT9-yXgAESWX1.jpg

Americans living with HIV/AIDS should not have to suffer because they can’t afford the outrageous prices charged for medicine they need to live.

Our job is to bring down the cost of prescription drugs and make health care a right for all. #WorldAIDSDay

Sending my condolences and prayers to the family and friends of President George H.W. Bush and to the American people who are mourning his passing. May his devotion to public service and his commitment to his family be an inspiration to us all.

RT @neeratanden It seems a Republican campaign went to the houses of older Democrats, claimed to be officials, took their absentee ballots and got rid of them.  The Republican “won” by 900 votes. It’s 2018.  Every major newspaper should be on that story.  #NC9

In his words, “the old ideas are new again because they are not old, they are timeless: duty, sacrifice, commitment, and a patriotism that finds its expression in taking part and pitching in.”

Over his storied career, President Bush was a war hero and a businessman, a legislator and an ambassador. His time as Vice President prepared him well for the heavy burdens of that highest office, steering our nation through the fall of the Berlin Wall and the First Gulf War.

President George H. W. Bush once pledged that he would, “keep America moving forward, always forward—for a better America, for an endless enduring dream and a thousand points of light.” My full statement on his passing: https://www.rubio.senate.gov/public/index.cfm?p=Press-Releases&id=EC560F6E-EB23-4074-9F8F-79E388A61F72
